website_summaries.verdict: The Pentax K-3 is the most refined K-mount SLR to date, offering fast autofocus and superb image quality. Its video autofocus implementation isn't the best, but it still manages to snag our Editors' Choice award.

customer_reviews.title: Try this camera, you will be amazed.
customer_reviews.text: An exciting camera, I also have a Canon700D, there is nothing wrong with the Canon, I like it, sturdy and reliable. The Pentax felt heavier at first, but after a few hours the weight was no problem, it is a very versatile, interesting and exciting camera, it is very easy to use, the kit lenses supplied are very good, I bought a t2 adapter for the mirror lens, great fun, just waiting for a 50mm prime lens. The Pentax K3 will enable you to improve your photo skills.
customer_reviews.author: John Wishart

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Wait
customer_reviews.text: I've already used this to gather source material in France for a new project. The images saved as DNG's were absolutely stunning. I haven't bought a DSLR since I bought the Pentax istD as I've been waiting for them to produce a model that delivers more than 20MP. That was 8 years ago but it was worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Little Expertise and Less Intelligence

customer_reviews.title: What a fantastic deal! Oh and the camera is brilliant too
customer_reviews.text: This review relates specifically to the k3 plus 2 lenses 55-200 and 18-55. The price is simply unbeatable and quite frankly difficult to believe!! But it's true. I know because I bought one. What a fantastic deal! Oh and the camera is brilliant too! At the time I bought this camera plus 2 kit lenses it was priced below the listing for the camera body itself! Although it does appear to have gone up by nearly £100 recently it's still brilliant value. Comes factory sealed too in shrink wrap
customer_reviews.author: Phil S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pentax make a great camera, I would not use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: RGolding

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant camera. Love it to bits. Such an improvement from k-5 model. I am very happy with a purchase
customer_reviews.author: olena K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: DELIGHTED WITH THIS - EASY TO USE AND EXCELLENT QUALITY CAMERA
customer_reviews.author: Dessy

customer_reviews.title: Pentax, super camera.
customer_reviews.text: A great camera. Love it. So many things it can do. Came really fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New to photography but this Camera is versatile and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Superb Camera, New to photography but this Camera is versatile and easy to use,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pentax K3 with 18-135mm wr lens
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reviews on the web, and I'm not disappointed. It's a great camera built like a tank, non of this polycarbonate rubbish, so it can take knocks. It has all the bells and whistles of a high end dslr at a fraction of their price. So all in all a fine camera, and the 18-135mm lens us good too.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Edward Blockley

customer_reviews.title: Dream camera
customer_reviews.text: For Pentax fans this camera is a great upgrade. It's a dream. Bit of noise, but nothing critical.
customer_reviews.author: Pammi

customer_reviews.title: ... number of Pentax SLR's through the years I absolutely love this one
customer_reviews.text: Having had a number of Pentax SLR's through the years I absolutely love this one! It is flexible, intuitive and produces some stunning results!
customer_reviews.author: T D Notman

customer_reviews.title: one of pentax's best. fast
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous camera, superb pictures, one of pentax's best. fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: tamarind1972

customer_reviews.title: A brilliant Camera. Only used it a couple of times ...
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant Camera. Only used it a couple of times so far! But very happy with it! Used it with the Sigma 70 to 300 macro zoom which excellent too! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Keith Jordan

customer_reviews.title: a christmas present from me to me - PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: IT IS EVERYTHING I EXPECTED FROM THE OTHER REVIEWS. I invite youto make your own mind up. The only missing thing would have been if it had been a full-frame. Ah well.
customer_reviews.author: ladybandit12

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: This is a real quality camera that performs excellently. I am really pleased that there is a quality alternative to Canon and Nikon products. So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: W. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great image quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding DSLR camera and I'm delighted with it. I use it exclusively for stills (so I cannot comment on video capabilities), and most of my photography is wildlife, largely the very demanding area of birds. You do need a fair bit of knowledge to use it properly (it is rightly described as expert level, rather than beginner or intermediate), but I have been thrilled with the image quality and have no regrets whatsoever in choosing this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Camsaint

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: A big step up from noisy superzoom and compact cameras! And a better bet than spending massive amounts on compact camera 'dust traps' that can suck dust into the sensor and lens when zooming. With a DSLR you can get at the sensor to clean it yourself if you need to.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera with very sharp images
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera with very sharp images. I have a K5 so the camera is very similar so it's an easy transition. I would have given 5 stars but the K5 speed grip which looks identical doesn't fit because one of the locating pins is about .5 mm too wide so I feel that I have been ripped off. It's a shame that Pentax have stooped so low.
customer_reviews.author: Bengo

customer_reviews.title: A joy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was/am a Canon shooter but bought this because I have always loved Pentax from the days of film. Even with the kit 18-135 lens the results are fantastic and the dng files have more latitude than any I get from my Canons - both full frame and APS-C. The camera is a joy to use - just so intuitive and it just feels 'right'. In summary, whenever I go out now I just reach for the Pentax - my Canons stay in their bags.
customer_reviews.author: Anglosaxon

customer_reviews.title: My beautiful Pentax K3
customer_reviews.text: I brought this as an upgrade to my Pentax K10D, wow what an upgrade, colour definition is much better, exposure is spot on if you use the white balance exposure settings, the detail is splendid, I also brought the battery grip and two extra batteries and it's an absolute joy to use. I can't praise it highly enough
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Pentax K-3 - Digitalkamera - SLR
